channel.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: tech
channel.description: Get the latest news online at Major Digest, the top online news resource for the most reliable news sources. Stay informed about the world around you!

image.title: Major Digest - Reliable and Comprehensive News Sources: tech

item.title: What is Skylight? Here’s what you need to know about the TikTok alternative
item.description: The current king of social media is the short-form video platform TikTok. It’s where trends are forged, news is broken, and opinions spread.
item.dc:creator: Michael Grothaus, Fast Company

item.title: Nearly 58 billion personal data points have been leaked online since 2004, new study reveals
item.description: Your digital life is more exposed than you think. A new study from security firm Surfshark has quantified the astonishing scale of data breaches since 2004, revealing that tens of billions of personal data points, from passwords to physical addresses, are now in the wild.
item.dc:creator: Rene Millman, TechRadar

item.title: Gartner: AI budgets are going to projects that demonstrate value, real-world impact
item.description: Many infrastructure and operations leaders aren’t able to dig out enough money from budgets to reallocate to AI projects, Gartner said in a survey released this week. The research firm surveyed 253 IT leaders globally, and the budget issue plagued half the participants.
item.dc:creator: Computer World

item.title: Apple posts strong holiday outlook after sales decline in China
item.description: Apple Inc. projected a jump in sales over the holiday season after releasing new iPhones and worked to reassure investors concerned about a decline in revenue from China.
item.dc:creator: Bloomberg, The Mercury News

item.title: Fortnite The Simpsons live event build up: our live coverage of the upcoming The Simpsons crossover including start time and what we know so far
item.description: Here's our live coverage of the Fortnite The Simpsons live event, including everything you need to know in the build up to launch.
item.dc:creator: Jake Green, TechRadar

item.title: Context engineering: Improving AI by moving beyond the prompt
item.description: Organizations deploying AI have focused heavily on prompt engineering as a method for generating the best results, but an emerging technique called context engineering will make AI tools more accurate and useful, experts say.
item.dc:creator: CIO

item.title: OpenAI preps models to replace banking, consulting jobs
item.description: OpenAI’s decision to train its models on the everyday outputs of consultants and bankers is more than just a technical experiment, it’s a signal that AI is being repositioned from a generic tool to a domain-capable resource, Sanchit Vir Gogia, the chief analyst, founder and CEO of Greyhound Research
item.dc:creator: Computer World

item.title: This rapid SSD moves 1GB in just seconds, and offers fingerprint security - but it'll fit right in your top pocket
item.description: This compact SSD offers rapid transfers and fingerprint access, but its limited capacity and uncertain durability curb its professional potential.
item.dc:creator: Efosa Udinmwen, TechRadar

item.title: The worst part of dial-up internet is back - Raspberry Pi modder lets you "hear" your Wi-Fi
item.description: A YouTuber used Raspberry Pi hardware to recreate the eerie dial-up screech, transforming Wi-Fi signals into nostalgic analog noise.
item.dc:creator: Efosa Udinmwen, TechRadar

item.title: How tiny drones inspired by bats could save lives in dark and stormy conditions
item.description: WORCESTER, Mass. (AP) — Don't be fooled by the fog machine, spooky lights and fake bats: the robotics lab at Worcester Polytechnic Institute lab isn't hosting a Halloween party.
item.dc:creator: HOLLY RAMER, Associated Press, KRON4

item.title: Universal Music and AI song tool Udio settle lawsuit and partner on new platform, sparking backlash
item.description: LONDON (AP) — Universal Music Group and AI song generation platform Udio have settled a copyright infringement lawsuit and agreed to team up on new music creation and streaming platform, the two companies said in a joint announcement.
item.dc:creator: KELVIN CHAN, Associated Press, KLAS, CBS News

item.title: Mistake-filled legal briefs show the limits of relying on AI tools at work
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Judges around the world are dealing with a growing problem: legal briefs that were generated with the help of artificial intelligence and submitted with errors such as citations to cases that don’t exist, according to attorneys and court documents.
item.dc:creator: CATHY BUSSEWITZ, Associated Press, PIX 11

item.title: Nvidia valuation reaches $5 trillion
item.description:
The value of Nvidia’s stock has increased significantly in recent years, largely due to the high demand for its AI chips.
According to Reuters, another milestone was passed during Wednesday’s trading on the Nasdaq stock exchange, as Nvidia became the first company to be valued at $5 trillion.
item.dc:creator: Computer World

item.title: Windows 11: A guide to the updates
item.description: A Windows launch isn’t the end a process — it’s really just the beginning. Microsoft continually works on improving Windows 11 by fixing bugs, releasing security patches, and occasionally adding new features.
item.dc:creator: Computer World

item.title: Broadcom refuses to backtrack on huge VMware price increases, claims European cloud watchdog
item.description: Broadcom is still trying to strongarm VMware customers into accepting huge price increases and onerous licensing terms, says the European Cloud Competition Observatory (ECCO) in its latest report.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: Microsoft deploys a fix to Azure cloud service that's hit with outage
item.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Microsoft has deployed a fix to address an outage of their Azure cloud portal that left users unable to access Office 365, Minecraft and other services.
item.dc:creator: Associated Press, Fox 5

item.title: Character.AI is banning minors from interacting with its chatbots
item.description: Character.AI is banning minors from using its chatbots amid growing concerns about the effects of artificial intelligence conversations on children.
item.dc:creator: BARBARA ORTUTAY, Associated Press, NewsNation

item.title: A company that went from startup to program-of-the-year winner through AI innovation
item.description: "You always start with the people, having good members within your team that are always thinking ahead," Alexander Granados said. The post A company that went from startup to program-of-the-year winner through AI innovation first appeared on Federal News Network.
item.dc:creator: Terry Gerton, Federal News Network

item.title: Phony AI-generated videos of Hurricane Melissa flood social media sites
item.description: One viral video shows what appears to be four sharks swimming in a Jamaican hotel's pool as floodwaters allegedly brought on by Hurricane Melissa swamp the area. Another purportedly depicts Jamaica's Kingston airport completely ravaged by the storm.
item.dc:creator: TAIMOOR SOBHAN and KELVIN CHAN, Associated Press, KGET 17, NBC

item.title: Nvidia moves to build AI-native 5G/6G wireless stack for future networks
item.description: Nvidia is working with a cadre of industry expert at Booz Allen, Cisco, MITRE, ODC, Nokia and T-Mobile to bring an AI-native wireless stack for 6G networking to fruition.
item.dc:creator: Network World

item.title: Eight Sleep adds outage mode after AWS disruption
item.description: Mattress owners reported that their beds were stuck at sweltering temperatures and uncomfortable incline positions.
item.dc:creator: Taylor Delandro, NewsNation

item.title: Big Tech rethinking human workforce amid AI push
item.description: The World Economic Forum predicts 92 million jobs could be lost by 2030 — but another 170 million jobs could be created.
item.dc:creator: Ryan Bass, NewsNation

item.title: Signal: We have no choice but to use AWS
item.description: Last week, the privacy-focused messaging service Signal was temporarily shut down when Amazon Web Services (AWS) suffered a major outage. This led to criticism of Signal’s use of such a dominant provider as AWS.
item.dc:creator: Computer World

item.title: The top 4 JVM languages and why developers love them
item.description: The Java virtual machine provides a high-performance, universal runtime for a wealth of popular languages beyond just Java. In this article, we’ll look at the characteristic strengths and common use cases of four of the most popular JVM languages: Kotlin, Scala, Groovy, and Clojure.
item.dc:creator: Info World

item.title: Eclipse LMOS AI platform integrates Agent Definition Language
item.description: The Eclipse Foundation has introduced ADL (Agent Definition Language) functionality to its LMOS (Language Models Operating System) AI project. The announcement came on October 28.
item.dc:creator: Info World

item.title: Musk launches Grokipedia, AI-powered alternative to Wikipedia
item.description: Elon Musk launched Grokipedia on Monday as an alternative to the nonprofit-powered Wikipedia. Musk’s version is backed by xAI but still uses Wikipedia as a source on most subjects.
item.dc:creator: Ashleigh Fields, The Hill

item.title: Stragglers from Myanmar scam center raided by army cross into Thailand as buildings are blown up
item.description: BANGKOK (AP) — The number of people fleeing from Myanmar to Thailand after Myanmar’s military shut down a major online scam center has slowed to a trickle, a Thai regional army commander said Tuesday, after more than 1,500 had left in the past week.
item.dc:creator: Associated Press, KRON4

item.title: OPM bringing protections for data breach victims to an end
item.description: The Office of Personnel Management transferred the current identity protection contract to GSA in September and will let it run out at the end of 2026. The post OPM bringing protections for data breach victims to an end first appeared on Federal News Network.
item.dc:creator: Jason Miller, Federal News Network

item.title: Beware fake credit card account restriction scams
item.description: A phishing email scam targeting American Express customers shows how cybercriminals use fake urgent messages to steal personal and financial information.
item.dc:creator: Fox News
